content: 2mm hook stylecraft special dk in white and silver 2 x 6mm black safety eyes light grey felt black embroidery floss polyester toy filling pins to place pieces before sewing together darning needle stitch markers i prefer using scrap yarn as stitch markers baymax is approximately 13 5cm tall and 11cm in width from arm to arm and approximately 6 5cm from front to back weight 70g this includes all materials used to make baymax
